snippet: The State Supreme Court on Friday upheld a divorce granted to a same-sex couple, a rare decision in a state with a constitutional ban on same-sex marriage.
abstract: Texas Supreme Court upholds divorce granted to same-sex couple Angelique Naylor and Sabina Daly despite state's constitutional ban on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court on Friday upheld a divorce granted to a same-sex couple, a rare decision in a state with a constitutional ban on same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Texas: Divorce of Same-Sex Couple Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Texas: Divorce of Same-Sex Couple Upheld

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
